text: Erwin Wilhelm (6 September 1926 – 16 February 2012) was a German former footballer who played for Borussia Neunkirchen and the Saarland national team as a defender. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2012 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Saar footballers Category:Saarland international footballers Category:Borussia Neunkirchen players Category:Association football defenders
title: Erwin Wilhelm
